description:
Summer School - Kana who has just joined Fushin Newspaper Company is appearing to be filled with emotions on her first day of school. When it seemed like she is getting used to her new life, a transfer student appears. That transfer student is the same person Kana meet on her first paper delivery, Mika. After school, she couldn`t understand why Mika was waiting in front of Fushin newspaper when she works at a competing newspaper company. In order to save the company Mika works for, Kana encourages her to get new customers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はじめての, スマイル
